name: Linx Aviation ATO
about: Linx Aviation ATO is one of the largest and most reputable training centers for aviation personnel in the Balkans. With a long history of being the first step towards aviation for many, our school boasts experienced instructors and a comprehensive training program. We are an Approved Training Organization, dedicated to providing high-quality education and training to aspiring pilots. Our facility is equipped with modern resources and equipment, ensuring students receive the best possible preparation for their aviation careers. Join us at Linx Aviation ATO to embark on your journey to becoming a professional pilot.
services:
["Private Pilot License - PPL(A)
Commercial Pilot License - CPL(A)
Airline Transport Pilot License - ATPL(A)
Instrument rating / Single-Engine / Multi-Engine
Multi engine piston
TYPE RATING / CLASS RATING"]
